sense.gloss: to tighten, to fasten tight, to constrict, to compress
to control strictly, to put pressure on, to squeeze (e.g. an economy), to oppress

sdata.j: インフレを↑抑制↑↓よくせい↓しようとして↑金融↑↓きんゆう↓↑政策↑↓せいさく↓に↑偏重↑↓へんちょう↓すると、↑金融↑↓きんゆう↓、したがって↑景気↑↓けいき↓を↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓↑以上↑↓いじょう↓に↑締↑↓|し↓め↑付↑↓つ↓ける|ことになりかねない。
sdata.e: Excessive reliance on monetary policy in an attempt to curb inflation could unnecessarily constrain credit and hence business.
